name: Todesfall
description:
Todesfall is a brutal roguelike shoot em up dungeon crawler set in the early 19th century with a artstyle which hearkens back to Atari classics. You have wandered into a dilapidated spider infested castle with only a slow firing musket to defend yourself with (bring a bayonet next time!) Can you survive the relentless hordes of foes? Or will you capitulate to your fate like all the others before you.

This game was made in 20 hours for the 4mb game jam! A alternative Godot web build will hopefully be available in a couple of days. I'm really trying to run with this whole indie game dev thing so if you have a spare moment please leave some feedback! Better yet if you like the game and want to see more stuff like it check out my profile!

CONTROLS

Move - Arrow keys

Aim - Mouse

Fire - Click the left mouse button

Reload - Hold the right mouse button until the bar on the top fills up.

CREDITS

AUDIO

Folly efx : sfxr

Rain : lebastoon100 (freesound)

(P.S, if anyone actually manages to get to the last level on Hardcore mode, let me know with a screenshot and I'll add you in the credits)
